video.title: Sarah & Duck
video.synopsis: No matter the circumstance, Sarah and Duck remain the best of friends, even though Sarah is 7 and Duck is ... well, a mallard.

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck plant some mystery seeds; Duck desperately wants to be a penguin; Sarah and Duck try to find the source of Donkey's sadness.
episodes.title: Lots of Shallots / Sarah, Duck and the Penguins / Cheer Up Donkey

episodes.synopsis: Sarah bakes a cake for Duck's birthday; Scarf Lady invites Sarah and Duck into her home; Duck is careless with one of his favorite toys.
episodes.title: Cake Bake / Scarf Lady's House /  Robot Juice

episodes.synopsis: Sarah's bouncy ball has a problem; Sarah and Duck make a new friend over breakfast; Sarah and Duck visit a special shop after Duck's chair breaks.
episodes.title: Bouncy Ball / Rainbow Lemon / Sit Shop

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck spend a windy day flying a new kite; Sarah finds an umbrella that seems to hate the rain; Sarah and Duck shop for new toys.
episodes.title: Kite Flight / Umbrella and the Rain / Big Shop

episodes.synopsis: Scarf Lady's jukebox inspires Sarah to knit an instrument band; Sarah and Duck try to play doubles tennis; Sarah and Duck can't find their park bench.
episodes.title: Woollen Music / Doubles / Fairground

episodes.synopsis: Sarah comes down with a cold; Sarah and Duck stop exercising so they can help their neighbors; Sarah and Duck are giddy about stargazing.
episodes.title: Sarah Gets a Cold / Ribbon Sisters / Stargazing

episodes.synopsis: Rainbow proves to be a colorful muse; a tired Sarah tries to make Duck some dessert; Sarah and Duck become amateur bird photographers.
episodes.title: Coloured Light / Strawberry Souffle / Camera

episodes.synopsis: Sarah buys a new pair of shoes; Sarah and Duck learn how to bobsleigh; fireworks frighten Duck during a game of hide-and-seek.
episodes.title: Tapping Shoes / Bobsleigh / Fireworks Dance

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck are forced to find a new park; Sarah and Duck look into a loud noise; Sarah and Duck try to figure out what Tortoise wants.
episodes.title: Fancy Park / Pipe Conductor / Slow Quest

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck get pulled into a treasure hunt; the ducks decide to crown Sarah; Sarah and Duck invite Flamingo and John over.
episodes.title: World Bread Day / Pond Princess / Scared of Stairs

episodes.synopsis: Scarf Lady soars in a knitted hot-air balloon; Sarah and Duck's tandem bike gets a flat; Sarah and Duck search for Plate Girl's missing plate.
episodes.title: Balloon Race / Puncture Pump / Plate Fog

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck give Moon some painting lessons; Sarah and Duck dress up and put on a play; Sarah and Duck use their bike to help Bread Man.
episodes.title: Moon Paint / The Play / Bread Bike

episodes.synopsis: Bug's plant begins to droop; Scarf Lady needs more wool; Sarah falls in love with octagons; Bug helps Sarah find lights for her Christmas tree.
episodes.title: Bug's Button Bank / No More Wool / Octagon Club / Petal Light Picking

episodes.synopsis: Sarah helps the Shallots explore beyond their garden; Umbrella must outgrow his fear of getting wet; on a hot day, a fascinating place offers shade.
episodes.title: Outside Outside / Umbrella Bubbles / Cloud Tower

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck try to re-create music she heard on the radio; Sarah's friends keep her birthday wish from coming true; Tortoise prepares to hibernate.
episodes.title: Sound Jumble / The Mouse's Birthday / Tortoise Snooze

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck play a new game at Flamingo and John's house; Scarf Lady needs help when she misplaces Bag; The Ribbon sisters celebrate the season.
episodes.title: Fast Slow Bungalow / Bags of Bags / Ribbon Fall

episodes.synopsis: Sarah helps Duck create a new kind of computer game; Sarah and Duck receive mysterious Christmas gifts; John has trouble with his paper flamingos.
episodes.title: Garden Gaming / Seacow Snow Trail / Origami Overload

episodes.synopsis: The Shallots perform an acrobatics act; Sarah shows Duck cleaning up can be fun; Sarah, Duck and Plate Girl make an unusual discovery at the Big Shop.
episodes.title: Shallot Circus / Toy Tidy / Plate Escape

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and her pals struggle to doze off during a sleepover; Sarah and Duck ride a bus that makes stops underwater; Duck might get a brand new voice.
episodes.title: The Big Sleepover / Paisley Sea / Duck's Quack

episodes.synopsis: A lonely Rainbow needs a bright idea; Donkey thinks the decorations for Tortoise's party are just his taste; Sarah stays at a hotel built for ducks.
episodes.title: Rainbow's Niece / Decorating Donkey / Duck Hotel

episodes.synopsis: Umbrella feels anxious about meeting his pen pal; Sarah helps out when John's yellow ball gets too bouncy; Cake gets bored with living in the fridge.
episodes.title: Parasol Show / Extra Bounce / Cake Relocate

episodes.synopsis: Sarah uses a toy to find the librarian's lost book; Sarah and Duck help Scooter Boy regain confidence after a mishap; Sarah's tuba makes weird sounds.
episodes.title: Lost Librarian / Scooter Stand Hill / Music Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Bad weather makes trouble at Scarf Lady's outdoor sale; Sarah and Duck want to visit the Lemon Cafe; Venus tries to redecorate the sky.
episodes.title: Wool On Wheels / Lemon Cafe / Star Renovation

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Duck remake scenes from Scarf Lady's old movies; Sarah and Duck try to build sand animals on the beach; The Bubble Man visits the Big Shop.
episodes.title: Woolly Memories / Beach Break / Bubble Bumbling

episodes.synopsis: Sarah helps Scarf Lady fix her roof; Sarah's hungry belly rumbles and starts a chat with a frog; A trip to the art gallery helps Duck find a lost toy.
episodes.title: Toggle Tangle / Tummy Talk / Moon's Exhibition

episodes.synopsis: Sarah gets inspired to write poetry; the art gallery celebrates the color pink; Bug and his pals perform at a concert; Duck wants to try migrating.
episodes.title: Pond Prose / The Art Of Pink/Bug Bop / Duck Flies
